title: Camerawoman plans to sue refugee she infamously tripped and Facebook
text:
Camerawoman plans to sue refugee she infamously tripped, and Facebook 
CBC News Friday 23rd October, 2015 
Petra Laszlo, currently under criminal investigation by Hungarian prosecutors, told a Russian newspaper this week that she plans to sue both Facebook and a refugee she was seen kicking on camera once her trial is over. (Left: L?szl? Petra Sz?gyenfal/Facebook , Right: AFP/Getty Images) 
...
